attributes.action: Play ‘God Save The Queen’ by The Sex Pistols at the end of the BBC News At Ten
attributes.additional_details: To help everyone feel more patriotic, more pride in are cuntry and encourage everyone to jump about.
attributes.background: Play ‘God Save The Queen’ by The Sex Pistols at the end of BBC News At Ten every evening.

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

The BBC is an independent body governed by a Royal Charter. Under the terms of that Charter, the BBC is operationally and editorially independent of government and there is no provision for the Government to intervene in the BBC’s day-to-day operations.
